QuestData.Title: Maziel's Revelation
QuestData.Description: The notes continue Maziel's rambling research into the properties of quicksilver and mercurial oozes.$B$BHe appears to have made a major discovery. He mentions hiding his journal in the Lower Silvermarsh to the southwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Maziel's Journal at the Lower Silvermarsh in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: Maziel's journal appears to be undamaged by the mercury.
